title: cinnamon plantation with cultivable land in great location
details:
400 perches land located in a peaceful Buddhist village approximately 3 Km inland in Weligama area.most part of the land is taken by cinnamon plantation which provides the considerable amount of extra income during the harvest period.
location is very quiet being slightly inland from the busy town area.electricity and water could be easily connected to the property and also good road network.famous Weligama surfing beach with numerous hotels and an ideal place for nature lovers. very popular Mirissa tourism area is 8 Km away from the property.Fantastic investment opportunity for a hotel or villa development project.
